changeSet.comment: Ensure the legacy staging user account is not the owner of the staging schema. Rollback is not applicable.
changeSet.sql: IF (EXISTS (SELECT * FROM information_schema.schemata WHERE schema_name = 'FFF_STAGING' AND schema_owner = N'${fffsWebPortalLegacyStagingDbUsername}')) ALTER AUTHORIZATION ON SCHEMA::FFF_STAGING TO dbo
